entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 p.m. ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
